summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Shyam Tex Hub B2B website - all major functionality working perfectly

email_integration_notes.issue: Email functionality uses placeholder API key 'your_sendgrid_api_key_here'
email_integration_notes.impact: Emails will fail gracefully but forms still save to database successfully
email_integration_notes.note: This is expected behavior until real SendGrid key is provided

design_issues.issue: Desktop navigation not properly hidden on mobile viewport
design_issues.note: Mobile menu toggle exists but desktop nav still visible on mobile

passed_tests: Contact form submission with database storage
Quote request form submission with database storage
Homepage loading with all required sections
Navigation across all 5 pages (Home, About, Products, Clients, Contact)
About Us page with company info, vision, mission, manufacturing capabilities
Products page displaying all 12 fabric categories with images
Clients page showing corporate client names
Contact information display with Google Maps link
Brand name 'Shyam Tex Hub' display in header and footer
Success toast notifications after form submissions
Basic responsive design elements (mobile menu toggle)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All core functionality working, minor responsive issue
